Fantasy 











 





Lit up
 




Steve Nash always gets in the middle of the action.  (Getty Images)



      
    

    

      
      You want hustle, Steve Nash? Here it is. The re-energized Suns scratch, 
      claw and run their way to a 101-81 victory over the Spurs, tying the 
      series. With his nose intact, Nash drops 20 points and 16 assists. Full story
 Related Links:• LeBron, Cavs top Nets for 2-0 lead | CLE-NJ: Series matchup | Experts• SA-PHO: Series matchup | Mejia: 10 | Yo! |  Jazz | Zombie speaks


 


 

 





 Power Rankings: Defections don't faze these Colts


    

      
      The Patriots add weapons. The Bolts and Broncos are right there, too. But 
      the Colts, even down a few players, are already better 
      than the '06 champs, Pete Prisco says.
    

  
• Colts draft nine | Draft Grades: B+ |  Prisco Power


 

 





 Power Rankings: Cool cats plugging along, staying hot


    

      
      The ace has been out since March. The No. 1 setup guy is down 'til 
      August. Yet the Tigers 
      keep winning with big bats and the expert guidance of Jim 
      Leyland, Eric Mack says.
    

  
• Tigers top M's | Miller: A's hurting, too |  Fantasy
